body:
Boilerplate-Chester-WordPress-Theme
===================================

A simple WordPress theme written using the MVC framework Chester. It provides a starting point for a theme with some ideas from HTML5 boilerplate. It can also be used as a tutorial on how to use Chester.
tagline: A simple WordPress theme written using the MVC framework Chester. It provides a starting point for a theme with some ideas from HTML5 boilerplate. It can also be used as a tutorial on how to use Chester.
name: Boilerplate-chester-wordpress-theme
